articles.title: Homage to Kim Il Sung
Floral baskets laid before statues of Kim Il Sung
Floral basket to statue of Kim Il Sung from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral basket to statue of Kim Il Sung from Palestinian President
    Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Yasser Arafat, President of Palestine, sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 91 (2002).
 The floral basket was laid before the statue by Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on Jan. 1.    
 Written on the ribbons of the basket were letters "his excellency the great leader Kim Il Sung will be immortal."
